title: Expanded School Wi-Fi: Will it Cause Distractions or Increase Productivity?
text:
29 Expanded School Wi-Fi: Will it Cause Distractions or Increase Productivity? 
Center for Digital Education: Cassie Ferrante wants to use the Old Mill High School Wi-Fi on her iPhone to do research and check emails. But she really wants it so she can to listen to music and scroll through social media.
